introduce.en: We are team of eoscube Shenzhen China, with a total of more than 20 core members. Most of the technical team members come from the world's top five hundred communications company HUAWEI which has many years of cloud server deployment and research & development experience. We have a great advantage in the deployment and maintenance of block producer. The members of the technology team are from the gold medal team of HUAWEI cloud service and operation and maintenance, and have the experience and technology of serving 120 telecommunications operators in 75 countries.
